guide.title: Gentoo Forums Downtime/Upgrade Information
guide.abstract: This page details the progress of the forum upgrade during its downtime.

body.p: The server that the forum is hosted on currently runs MySQL 4, but is being upgraded by the OSL to MySQL 5. This migration will bring the forums off-line while the database is converted, UTF-8 support also being implemented.
The migration is currently being planned for either the weekend beginning the September 1 or 8.
